misc: Famous for being an ambassador for the AimPoint method for putting.
biography: Timo, a familiar face at the Hector Trophée, is set to make his ninth appearance at the upcoming Hector Trophée 2025. Representing Keimola Golf, Timo has become a celebrated figure in the tournament's history.

With a total of three Hector Trophée victories under his belt, Timo's prowess in pair play is undeniable. Though the individual Victor Trophy has eluded him thus far, his contributions to his teams have been pivotal in securing those coveted titles.

Beyond his achievements on the course, Timo is widely recognized as an ardent ambassador for the AimPoint method of putting. His dedication to mastering and promoting this technique has earned him the respect of peers and fans alike. Timo's commitment to the sport extends beyond mere competition; he is genuinely invested in improving the game for himself and others.
